document_data.name: Stannoc
document_data.mainbody: '''Old Stannoc''' was a [[halfling]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Stannoc spent all his time inside the [[Yawning Portal]] inn. He was a gambler and odds-maker, speculating on various aspects of adventurers' [[Undermountain]] careers. He knew a lot about the dungeon, including some forgotten secrets.
document_data.Personality: Stannoc was a very able judge of character and often with only a small conversation with an adventurer Stannoc understood if they would live or die in the dungeon.
